i sell miscelaneous stuff in local fairs.

participant_2.background:
I spent my last birthday at the library with Nanette.
I'm passionate about my career and I want to be the best I can be.
i live in a condo.
i want to go back to school.
I'm a social media enthusiast looking to learn how to use it to grow my business.

content.text: What's your name?
My name is Nanette. I'm a social media enthusiast looking to learn how to use it to grow my business.
Oh, that's nice. What kind of business do you have?
I'm a fashion designer. I'm hiding my passion to my conservative family.
Oh, that's interesting. Why are you hiding it from them?
They're very religious and they don't approve of my career.
Oh, that's too bad. Well, I'm glad you're able to do what you love despite their disapproval.
Thanks, I appreciate that.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the library, I'm a huge reader. I also like to spend time with my family and friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I also like to read.
Oh, really? What are some of your favorite books?
I love to read historical fiction and romance novels.
Oh, I love historical fiction too! I'm currently reading a book about the French Revolution.
That sounds really interesting. I've never read anything about the French Revolution.
It's really good. I'm learning a lot about the history of France.
That's awesome. I'm going to have to check it out.
You should! It's a great book.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem
